alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 25 at 6:00PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 502 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MAINE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL MAINE KENNEBEC KNOX LINCOLN SAGADAHOC WALDO IN SOUTHWEST MAINE ANDROSCOGGIN CUMBERLAND YORK IN NEW HAMPSHIRE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL NEW HAMPSHIRE STRAFFORD IN SOUTHERN NEW HAMPSHIRE ROCKINGHAM THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALFRED, ALNA, APPLETON, ARROWSIC, ATKINSON, AUBURN, AUGUSTA, BARRINGTON, BATH, BELFAST, BIDDEFORD, BOWDOIN, BOWDOINHAM, BREMEN, BRISTOL, BROOKS, CAMDEN, CAPE ELIZABETH, CHESTER, CHINA, DAMARISCOTTA, DERRY, DOVER, DRESDEN, DURHAM, GREENE, HAMPSTEAD, HOLLIS, HOPE, JACKSON, KNOX, LEBANON, LEWISTON, LIBERTY, MADBURY, MINOT, MONTVILLE, MORRILL, NEW GLOUCESTER, NEWCASTLE, NEWTON, OLD ORCHARD BEACH, OWLS HEAD, PALERMO, PHIPPSBURG, PLAISTOW, PORTLAND, ROCHESTER, ROCKLAND, ROCKPORT, ROLLINSFORD, SABATTUS, SACO, SALEM, SANFORD, SIDNEY, SOMERSWORTH, SOUTH PORTLAND, TOPSHAM, TURNER, VASSALBORO, WALES, WATERVILLE, WESTBROOK, WHITEFIELD, AND WINDSOR.
